T02n800u_001:6: atha vajrapāṇinirmāṇakāyaḥ sucandro rājā paramādibuddhatantrarāje sekārthaṃ
T02n800u_001:7: sucandra āheti he śāstaḥ sekaḥ saptavidha udakādyanujñāvasānaḥ |
T02n800u_001:14: śṛṇv ityādi bhagavato vākyam uddeśasamāptiṃ yāvat |
T02n800u_001:34: sa eva hi saṃgītikārakaiḥ pṛthak kriyate tadānyatantro bhavati |
T02n800u_001:42: mahoddeśaś ceti cakrārād mahacchabdākṣepe mahānirdeśa ucyate |
T02n800u_001:43: dvayam etad yathāsaṃkhyam alpaṭīkā bṛhaṭṭīkā cocyate |
T02n800u_001:44: evam ity uktakrameṇa ṣaṭkoṭibhiḥ ṣaḍvidhair alpatantrabṛhattantrasaṃgītyādikaiḥ śuddhaṃ pariśuddham ādibuddhaṃ kālacakrābhidhānakaṃ syād iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ |
T02n800u_001:54: kāyavākcittasaṃśuddhyā abhiṣekadvayaṃ dvayam ity udakamukuṭābhyāṃ kāyaśuddham |
T02n800u_001:58: anyair aparā yā śuddhiḥ sā dhātvādiśuddhitaḥ | (40)
T02n800u_001:64: kumbhādayas tu sekā maṇḍalavartanam antareṇāpi deyāḥ |
T02n800u_001:66: janakaḥ sarvatāyinām iti tāyināṃ pañcatathāgatānāṃ nirāvaraṇatvena janakaḥ |
T02n800u_001:68: ata evāha | astināstivyatikrāntair ity abhāva ityādi |
T02n800u_001:72: tatra pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ tad vyapagatasakalakalpanākalaṅkaṃ sadgurumārgopadeśajātatattvayogād gaganetārācakravad anekasaṃbhogakāyaṃ māṃsacakṣurgrāhyam
T02n800u_001:73: prathamaṃ māṃsacakṣuṣādikarmiyogi viśvam abhijñām antareṇa paśyati | (41)
T02n800u_001:80: evaṃ tathāgatasya pañcacakṣūṃṣi māṃsādīni śūnyatādarśanaṃ praty uktāni |
T02n800u_001:81: anumānapūrvakam ālambanārthaṃ tattvataḥ kalpanaṃ citrādopadarśitaṃ bālayogināṃ śūnyatāmārgāvatāranārtham |
T02n800u_001:82: tasmād abhāve bimbe svapnādisadṛśe yā bhāvanālambanaṃ sā yogināṃ bhāvanā kalpanā na bhavaty akalitahetūdbhūtatvāt |
T02n800u_001:85: cittasya yataḥ pratibhāsamānam apahnotuṃ na śakyate |
T02n800u_001:86: aṇusaṃdohā bhāvāś ca na gṛhyate pratibimbavat |
T02n800u_001:95: asyāḥ pratisenāyā dṛśyamānāyā yo bhāvaḥ pratibhāsalakṣaṇaḥ sa na bhāvaḥ syāt tad vastu na bhavati |
T02n800u_001:104: cintāmaṇir ivetyādi kalpanāpoḍhatvam abhrāntatvaṃ ca jñānasyāha |
T02n800u_001:105: nanu yad anālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ jagadarthakāri viṣayeṇa vinotpattir ity āha |
T02n800u_001:116: kumāryā yad dṛśyamānam ajātam anutpannaṃ tat tasyā jātakaṃ yathotpannam ity arthaḥ |
T02n800u_001:119: īdṛśe svapnamāyāsadṛśe bimbe dṛṣṭe sati tatas tadanantaraṃ prāṇāyāmaṃ pūrakakumbhakarecakaṃ nirantaram anavacchinnaṃ kuryāt |
T02n800u_001:143: candras toyadhātur upāyasya śukradhātoḥ kāyo bhavati |
T02n800u_001:144: prajñāyā rajodhātor divākaras tejodhātur vāg bhavati |
T02n800u_001:147: prajñāṅgabhāvo hy upāye bhavati suratakāle cittasya tadākāratvāt |
T02n800u_001:152: yadādho viḍnāḍī niruddhā bhavati tadordhve vāmanāḍyām ariṣṭaṃ bhavati |
T02n800u_001:153: yadā mūtranāḍī niruddhā bhavati todordhve dakṣiṇanāḍyām ariṣṭaṃ bhavati |
T02n800u_001:164: divāniśam ahorātre dvādaśasaṃkrāntau pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsān madhyamā vahati |
T02n800u_001:165: vāmā dakṣinā ca nāḍī pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsonān yān ekaviṃśatisahasrān ṣaṭśatair adhikāṃs tān vahati |
T02n800u_001:166: tripakṣyadhikatrivarṣāṇi ca śatavarṣe pūrṇe vahati madhyamā |
T02n800u_001:167: vāmā savyā dakṣiṇordhve prāṇe yathākrameṇa saṃjñā candro'rkaś ca |
T02n800u_001:170: adha ity apāne madhyamā nāḍī cetyādinā |
T02n800u_001:173: ūrdhve yā vāmanāḍī sādho madhyā viḍnāḍī |
T02n800u_001:174: ūrdhve yā dakṣiṇā sādho vāmā mūtravāhiṇī |
T02n800u_001:190: adho nābhau guhye ca maṇyabje śaṅkhinī kāyavākcittavāhiṇī sattvarajastamobhedena tridvyekaguṇātmikā saṃhārakrameṇa nirgacchati |
T02n800u_001:192: eṣā śaṅkhinī strīṇāṃ sukhāt surate śukraṃ vahati |
T02n800u_001:199: yādhaḥ strīṇāṃ khagamukhā śukravāhataḥ saiva yadā rajo vahati tadā caṇḍālī bhavati |
T02n800u_001:200: tasminn eva cartukāle strīṇām ūrdhvanāḍī ḍombī bhavati |
T02n800u_001:202: puṃsaḥ puruṣasya tv ṛtukāle śukrāgamanakāle saiva ḍomby avadhūtī syāt |
T02n800u_001:207: madhye madhyamāmārge ṣaṣṭhaṃ jñānamaṇḍalam ākāśādipañcamaṇḍalāt pratyekamaṇḍalasya sapādaikādaśaśvāsān gṛhītvā sapādaṣaṭpañcāśataśvāsātmakaṃ vahati |
T02n800u_001:208: āsāṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyanāḍīnām ahorātreṇa yathākramaṃ nābhipadme dvādaśadalātmake ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalāni |
T02n800u_001:209: vāme ca lagne viṣame meṣādye dakṣiṇalagne same vṛṣabhādye |
T02n800u_001:210: tatra dakṣiṇe vṛṣalagne yadā vahati vāyus tadā mūle nāsāpuṭasyādhobhāge bhūmimaṇḍalaṃ daṇḍaikaṃ vahati |
T02n800u_001:220: ekā nāḍī kati śvāsān vahatīty āha |
T02n800u_001:226: aṣṭādaśaśataśvāsāṃś ca dvādaśasaṃkrāntibhir gaṇitā ahorātreṇa ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsā bhavanti |
T02n800u_001:229: dalamadhya iti yadā vāmanāḍyāṃ meṣādinā nāsāpuṭamadhye śūnyamaṇḍalaṃ vahati tadābhyantare'pi dalamadhye vahatīti vakṣyate |
T02n800u_001:230: tataḥ pūrva ity ūrdhve vāyumaṇḍalaṃ savye'gnimaṇḍalam |
T02n800u_001:237: pūrva ity ūrdhvamaṇḍale yathākramaṃ dharā pṛthivī vāyuś ca |
T02n800u_001:243: tathā hi parakulāliṅganena kāryodayo na svakulāliṅganena svātmani kriyā virodhāt |
T02n800u_001:256: śunyamaṇḍalasaṃyoga iti vāmadakṣiṇavāhināṃ daśamaṇḍalānāṃ saṃyoga ekatvaṃ madhyamā- (50)
T02n800u_001:259: karatale puṭite mūrdhni śirasi kṛta ekamukhaṃ vajraṃ bhavati |
T02n800u_001:261: madhyamāpravāha yogenācyutasukhena bodhicittoddhāriteṇa sā vajraśikhāyāṃ kartavyā |
T02n800u_001:270: vāmāyāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ vā yathākrameṇādhiko vāyur ekarātram |
T02n800u_001:278: hi sūryaś candraguṇāñ śabdasparśarasarūpagandhān gṛhītvāriṣṭadināni darśayati |
T02n800u_001:279: te pañca pañcakena pañcamī yāvad vṛddhiḥ |
T02n800u_001:280: tataḥ ṣaṣṭhasaptamarāśāv ekottareṇa kramād vṛddhir iti |
T02n800u_001:282: yatra prāṇasya nivṛttiḥ kaiścid api kartuṃ na śakyate |
T02n800u_001:287: avidyādvādaśāṅgasvarūpaḥ puṭo bhūmyādau likhitvā prathamapuṭe pūrvādiṣu makarādijanmarāśiprabhṛtāv ariṣṭadināvaśeṣāyuṣo varṣamāsadinabhedena yathākramanyāsam āha |
T02n800u_001:290: dinais tithidikpañcaguṇadvyekaiś caivaṃ dehinām āyur gacchati |
T02n800u_001:292: pūrve janmalagnapatre trivarṣād aśītyuttarasahasradinagaṇād makarāt pañcatriṃśadadhikaśatadinagaṇaṃ tyajati |
T02n800u_001:293: tatas tad apatraṃ śūnyīkṛtya dvitīyapatre'vaśeṣadinagaṇaṃ gṛhītvā prāṇaśaktiḥ praviśati |
T02n800u_001:299: tataḥ patraṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣadinaṃ gṛhītvā pañcame praviśati |
T02n800u_001:307: aṣṭamaṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣam ekaviṃśatidinaṃ gṛhītvā navame praviśati |
T02n800u_001:309: avaśeṣam ekādaśadinaṃ gṛhītvā daśame praviśati navamaṃ śūnyīkṛtya |
T02n800u_001:312: tata ekādaśamaṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣadinatrayaṃ gṛhītvā dvādaśame praviśati |
T02n800u_001:314: avaśeṣaṃ dinam ekaṃ gṛhītvā karṇikāṃ praviśati |
T02n800u_001:317: sarvasya madhyasya trivarṣadinaiḥ prāṇaśaktir dvādaśarāśicakraṃ tyajati |
T02n800u_001:318: tato vijñānam api tyaktvā śvāsacakradharmapreritaprāṇavāyur nāsārandhragatyantare saṃbhramati |
T02n800u_001:321: mūlād iti prāṇasya janmarāśidinād ekottareṇa candrasyārohaṇakrameṇa caturmāsapakṣabhedādinā |
T02n800u_001:322: tatrāpi pūrvavad dvādaśacakraṃ likhitvā prathamapuṭe'riṣṭadinaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadāyurmāsās tu dvitīyapuṭe sthāpanīyāḥ |
T02n800u_001:324: ariṣṭavṛddhidvitīyamāsānte tṛtīyamāsapraveśe tasminn eva patre dinadvayaṃ vahati |
T02n800u_001:334: tato dvitīye punaḥ saptāṣṭanavame ca māse yathāsaṃkhyaṃ catuṣpañcaṣaḍdināni vahanti |
T02n800u_001:360: evaṃ pañcaviṃśatiṣaḍviṃśatisaptaviṃśaddināni yadā vahati tadā navamaṃ patraṃ tyajati |
T02n800u_001:363: evam aṣṭāviṃśatitriṃśatidināni yadā vahati tadā daśamapatraṃ tyajati |
T02n800u_001:366: ekatriṃśaddinaṃ dvātriṃśaddinaṃ yadā vahati tadaikādaśamapatraṃ tyajati |
T02n800u_001:369: tataḥ pūrvapatre'vāhitadinatrayād dvādaśame patre dinadvayaṃ vahati |
T02n800u_001:372: yāvat prāṇasya sa cakravicchedo bhavati vāmāriṣṭeṇa maraṇam ayogino yānti | (56)
T02n800u_001:375: mṛtyoḥ kālasya śatavarṣe pūrṇe madhyamārohaṇaṃ samaviṣamadinair vṛṣādimeṣādyair janmajātaiś ca maṇḍalaiḥ pṛthivyādikaiḥ |
T02n800u_001:393: uṣṇīṣāt sakāśād ūrṇāpaṅkaje bhrūmadhye śukrasyāgamanam ānandaṃ prathamam |
T02n800u_001:395: tato vividhaṃ ramaṇaṃ krīḍanagāḍhāliṅganaśītkāra kaṇṭhakūjanādilakṣaṇaṃ nābhau (58)
T02n800u_001:397: guhye ca gataṃ bodhicittaṃ viramānandaṃ tṛtīyam |
T02n800u_001:398: guhyād vajramaṇiparyantam acyutaṃ bodhicittaṃ sahajānandaṃ caturtham |
T02n800u_001:408: uṣṇīṣe lalāṭe pūrṇā prathamānandādibhedena śukrapratipad dvitīyā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamī lakṣaṇā |
T02n800u_001:410: kaṇṭhe hṛdaye ca ṣaṣṭhī saptamy aṣṭamī navamī daśamy aparā pūrṇā |
T02n800u_001:411: nābhau guhya ekādaśī dvādaśī trayodaśī caturdaśī pañcadaśī tṛtīyā pūrṇā |
T02n800u_001:413: guhyapadmā tayā bodhicitte guhye gate paramānandād yā ṣoḍaśī kalā sā maṇipadme vajramūrdhnigā bhavati |
T02n800u_001:414: tasmād ūrdhvaṃ kṛṣṇapratipadāgame virāgapraveśakāle cyutikālaḥ syāt |
T02n800u_001:416: asya sūryasya ṣoḍaśī kaloṣṇīṣakamale gatā saiva naṣṭacandra ity ākhyātaḥ |
T02n800u_001:424: sūrya eva rajo rajodharmitvād ūrdhve yāti |
T02n800u_001:426: yata evam ato'smāt kāraṇāc candrāmṛtasya śukradhātor ūrdhvam upari gamanam upadeśataḥ |
T02n800u_001:427: adhaś cārkarajaso gamanaṃ rāhulakṣaṇasya vijñānasyākṣarasukhaṃ gamanaṃ kartavyam iti |
T02n800u_001:430: candrāmṛtasya śukradhātoḥ pūrṇimā pūrṇatvaṃ buddhānām ūrṇābje bhavati |
T02n800u_001:432: tayoḥ pūrṇimāmāvāsyoḥ kalā yathākrameṇoṣṇīṣe vajramaṇau ca buddhānām iti | (61)
T02n800u_001:437: vajrapadaṃ jñānapadaṃ viparītam iti pratiṣṭhitam ity arthaḥ |
T02n800u_001:442: śiraso lambikānāṃ kāyavākcittajñānabindūnām ūrdhve krameṇākṣarasukhapūritānāṃ catuṣkāyaviśuddhim āha |
T02n800u_001:444: mahāsukhād iti vajrāgrād viparīteṇa yaḥ kāyabinduḥ sa turyākṣayataḥ śuddhakāyaḥ |
T02n800u_001:451: adha-upāyasyety adho vajrāgrād yat spharaṇaṃ kāyānāṃ tad upāyaś ca prajñāyāḥ punar ūrdhvato bhavet |
T02n800u_001:454: asyāḥ prajñāyāḥ kāyavajro lalāṭe pūrvavad viparīteṇa |
T02n800u_001:459: nanu candrasya sarvadā vṛddhyā bhavitavyam ity āha |
T02n800u_001:461: tathā hi yo vṛddhas tenāvaśyaṃ kṣayiṇā bhavitavyam anyathā nityatāprasaṅgaḥ |
T02n800u_001:462: na ca nityo'rthaḥ kaścid asti yena tasya nityatvaṃ parikalpanīyam |
T02n800u_001:464: tathāpy utpādavyaya eva tasya svabhāvo bhavatu |
T02n800u_001:466: svabhāvābhāvadharmāṇām iti svabhāvasyābhāvo yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yaḥ kṣayotpādaḥ sā māyā | (63)
T02n800u_001:468: ata eva na kṣayaṃ yānti bhūtāni na jāyanta iti saṃyogaviyogamātratvāt |
T02n800u_001:471: svaprajñāyā vividhalakṣaṇayāliṅgitaṃ cittaṃ padme guhye gataṃ yad maṇau vajramaṇau tac candragataspandarūpeṇa spandabhāvanā |
T02n800u_001:474: yadā hi gurūpadeśena praviṣṭe marīcikādimārge tadā tisro nāḍyaḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti |
T02n800u_001:475: tāsu pariśuddhāsu yadi kāyanāḍyāṃ prāṇo vahati tathāpi prāṇāyāmaḥ kartavyaḥ sa ca kāyabhāvanā |
T02n800u_001:478: yadā śaṅkhinīnāḍyāṃ śukranāḍyāṃ jñānabhāvanākṣarabhāvanā bhavati tadā samāhāra ekatvaṃ trivajrāṇāṃ trināḍīnām |
T02n800u_001:482: śiraso lalāṭāt pūrṇāpadaṃ guhyasthānaṃ bandhanaṃ paramārthata iti prāṇabandhanenākṣarasukhena |
T02n800u_001:483: vāsanety āvaraṇaṃ tasyā haraṇam apanayanam | tat pūrṇa- (64)
T02n800u_001:485: candrasya na cchedo na ca tasya pūraṇam |
T02n800u_001:486: tathoditaṃ jñānaṃ kramāt spandādibhedena bhūmibhir muditādyābhir ūrdhvam uṣṇīṣe pūrṇatāṃ yāti |
T02n800u_001:488: na jñānacchedo na ca tasya pūraṇam iti |
T02n800u_001:490: tena pūrṇāyāṃ na śaśī sthiraḥ pratipatpraveśakālakṣayatvāt |
T02n800u_001:493: jagatāṃ rāgavirāgābhyāṃ pūrṇā na pratiṣṭhitety āha |
T02n800u_001:495: ekakṣaṇābhisaṃbuddhaṃ yadā pūrṇāyāṃ guhyapadme niścalaṃ cittaṃ bhavet tadā taccittaṃ vajraṃ vajramaṇau niṣpandena sarvakṣaṇapūrakaṃ dvyayutadvyaṣṭaśataśvāsalakṣaṇam
T02n800u_001:497: evam asya cittasya na śuklapakṣe rāge sthitiḥ |
T02n800u_001:498: na ca gamanam asite pakṣe virāge |
T02n800u_001:499: ate eva pakṣadvayamadhyasthaṃ pūrṇāyāṃ gatam advayam apratiṣṭhitam |
T02n800u_001:505: tasya bodhisattvasyoṣṇīṣād udayaṃ pūrṇā vajramaṇau bhavet |
T02n800u_001:506: sa virāgāt kalāhāniḥ kalāya cayo vajrāt sakāśād bhavati |
T02n800u_001:508: punar apy evam udayaḥ punar maṇau pūrṇatā |
T02n800u_001:509: sa virāgāt kalāhānir na dehināṃ jñānahānir iti |
T02n800u_001:513: asya bodhicittasya mahāsukhasvabhāvaḥ sa pūrṇāśabdena bhaṇyate |
T02n800u_001:518: asya bodhicittasya niścalasya pūrṇāyāṃ guhyapadma ūrdhvam bhūmibhiḥ paripūrṇatā |
T02n800u_001:520: pakṣadvayaṃ vāmadakṣiṇaṃ meṣavṛṣādidvādaśarāśilakṣaṇam ākramya nirudhya dvādaśākārasatyārthaṃ dvādaśabhūmilābhataḥ |
T02n800u_001:523: ekārtham advayam iti yad advayadharmaṃ tad ekārtham ubhayapa- (67)
T02n800u_001:532: nadīnām udakaṃ praviṣṭaṃ tat samudre samatvaṃ yāti |
T02n800u_001:533: tathāyaṃ bhāvasamūhaḥ sthiracalātmako'kṣare sarvākārabimbe samas tulyo'kṣaro bhavati |
T02n800u_001:535: ayaṃ dhātusamūho lohādiko raseṇa pāradeṇa bhakṣito yathā rasatvaṃ yāti tat samo bhavati |
T02n800u_001:536: yathā vā bījaiḥ kādravādikaiḥ kṣityādiko dhātusamūho bhakṣito bījasvabhāvatvaṃ yāti |
T02n800u_001:537: sa eva phalakāle phalodayakāle mānavarjitaḥ saṃkhyārahito bhavati | (68)
T02n800u_001:539: evaṃ bhāvasamūho'pi sthiracalātmakaḥ paramākṣarabhakṣitaḥ sarvākārabimbena nirāvaraṇīkṛtaḥ paramākṣaratvam āyāti |
T02n800u_001:543: pūrṇāvasthāṃ vyāpitvaṃ gate viṣe daṣṭako daṃśasthāne vedanāduḥkhaṃ na vetti |
T02n800u_001:545: na ca viṣayān rūpādīn indriyadvāraiś cakṣurādibhir vetti |
T02n800u_001:546: evaṃ citte pūrṇakalāṃ gate vyāpitvaṃ gate na yogī vajramaṇau vetti satsukhaṃ nānyatrāpi na viṣayān indriyadvārair iti |
T02n800u_001:549: sarvataḥ smṛtimāl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati || iti |
T02n800u_001:557: yathā śilā mahāmaṇisparśāt taptatāṃ prabhāsvaratāṃ yāti tathākṣarasukhasparśāt sukhatām eti yāti vai niścitam |
T02n800u_001:558: kiṃ punaḥ paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyato jñānasadbhāvaḥ prabhāvo vitarkaḥ |
T02n800u_001:559: kiṃ tarkaṇīyaś cittasyāvedhanaṃ prati malāgantukaliptasya naivety arthaḥ |
T02n800u_001:561: atha citta utpanne sati paścād utpannas tadartham āha |
T02n800u_001:562: na cittāt sakāśāc cirakālikaḥ paścād utpanna ity arthaḥ |
T02n800u_001:563: atha cittaṃ vinā jātas tadartham āha |
T02n800u_001:570: yady ayam āgantuko malas tāmre tadā pūrvaṃ tāmraṃ kālikārahitam |
T02n800u_001:571: yadā cirakālī malaḥ paścāt tāmrasya sadbhāvas tadā tasya malasya kutaḥ kasmāt saṃbhavaḥ |
T02n800u_001:572: atha tāmreṇa vinā jātas tadākāśakusumasyāpi saṃ- (70)
T02n800u_001:574: bhavaḥ | atha tāmre'vyayatvena saṃsthitas tadā siddharaseṇāpy apanetuṃ na śakyate |
T02n800u_001:575: tasmāt sarvam etad yuktyā na saṃgacchati |
T02n800u_001:577: tāmreṇa sahotpanno'py ayaṃ kāliko rasayogād naśyati na paścād na pūrvaṃ na tadrahita iti |
T02n800u_001:580: āgantukaśabdaḥ kathaṃ boddhavya iti ced ucyate |
T02n800u_001:584: yauvane surate prāptā svayam eva vetti |
T02n800u_001:591: yadi teṣāṃ virāgasaṃbhūtir na bhavati tadā nānyaprakāreṇa (71)
T02n800u_001:598: ādhāre cyutim āpanna ādheyasya virāgatā bhavati |
T02n800u_001:599: ataś cyutirāgaṃ vivarjayed ity uktena saṃbandhaḥ |
T02n800u_001:602: akṣarodbhavakāyasya cittasyorṇācakramadhyagatasyālikālyor vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ samāyogo mīlanaṃ madhyamāpravāhitvaṃ hūṃkārādyaṃ ca madhyamāpravāhanibandhanaṃ neṣyate |
T02n800u_001:603: etac ca paramākṣarajñānasiddhāv evāryapuṇḍarīkapādaiḥ prapāñcitam iti na vistāryate |
